person.persName: George W. Drye (Major in 1st Ky Cavalry)

body.p: Born in 1844. Student of Georgetown College. Enlisted in First Kentucky Cavalry Regiment July 18, 1861. Entered as 1st Lieutenant, and appointed Adjutant at the regimental organization. Promoted Captain, April 14, 1862. Promoted Major, February 28, 1864.
